attributes.action: Create a cross party group to lead the UK COVID-19 response, lead by science.
attributes.additional_details: We are now entering lockdown 3 for the UK and it’s clear the Conservative government are prioritising the economy over people and although the economy is important we need to take a large short term hit like other countries have to get the virus under control. A cross party group being lead by scientists will be able to make calculated decisions which put people at the heart of those.
attributes.background: The Conservative party approach to COVID-19 isn’t working, a cross party group should be created to calculate the UK approach that is lead by the science and not the economic impact.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Establish a cross-party, cross-discipline panel to scrutinise Covid-19 policies
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551051

Form Cross Party Emergency Government to deal with Covid 19 then GE with PR
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331650
